original_text: And thou shalt make a vail of blue, and purple, and scarlet, and fine twined linen of cunning work: with cherubims shall it be made:
korean_text: 너는 청색 자색 홍색 실과 가늘게 꼰 베 실로 짜서 휘장을 만들고 그 위에 그룹들을 정교하게 수 놓아서

sentences.original_text: And thou shalt make a vail
of blue, and purple, and scarlet
and fine twined linen of cunning work
with cherubims shall it be made
